title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
description: Copper plate print. Design shows statue of Jeanne d' Arc in wreath of asters and bay leaves against background of red stripes with stars. Cotton printed in dark red.
